local_intent: Align to the T_block and execute a 0.1 push at 135 degrees, then re-detect to verify continued visibility.
assumptions: Tool yaw has been configured upstream to match the 135-degree push.
Workspace is planar and clear during the transfer phase.
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer loop by ApproachAndAlign followed by a short diagonal Push matching the global 135-degree direction and 0.1 distance, with a post-action detection for verification.
